hero.title: Transform Your Ideas Into
hero.subtitle: Stunning Visuals
hero.description: Create beautiful AI-generated images with complete control over every detail. From aspect ratio to seed values, our platform gives you the power to realize your creative vision.

features.title: Powerful Generation Features
features.description: Our platform offers complete control over the image generation process, giving you the tools to create exactly what you envision.

customizablePrompts.title: Customizable Prompts
customizablePrompts.description: Describe exactly what you want to see with our advanced prompt system

aspectRatios.title: Multiple Aspect Ratios
aspectRatios.description: Choose from common aspect ratios or set your own custom dimensions

batchGeneration.title: Batch Generation
batchGeneration.description: Generate up to 4 images simultaneously to explore different variations

inferenceSteps.title: Inference Steps Control
inferenceSteps.description: Adjust quality vs. speed with customizable inference steps

reproducibleResults.title: Reproducible Results
reproducibleResults.description: Set specific seed values to recreate or iterate on previous generations

outputFormats.title: Multiple Output Formats
outputFormats.description: Export your images as PNG, JPEG, or WebP with adjustable quality

resolutionControl.title: Resolution Control
resolutionControl.description: Set megapixel values to control image size and detail

easyDownloads.title: Easy Downloads
easyDownloads.description: Download individual images or batches in your preferred format

cta.title: Start Creating Amazing Images Today
cta.description: Join thousands of creators who are already using our platform to bring their ideas to life. No technical skills required â€” just your imagination.

generator.title: Image Generator
generator.description: Create stunning AI-generated images by customizing parameters below
generator.authDescription: You need to be logged in to generate images.

prompt.label: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: Describe the image you want to generate...
prompt.description: Be detailed and specific about what you want to see

aspectRatio.label: Aspect Ratio
aspectRatio.description: Choose the dimensions for your image

steps.label: Inference Steps: {value}
steps.description: Higher values = better quality but slower generation

useSeed.label: Use Custom Seed
useSeed.description: Enable to use a specific seed value

outputQuality.label: Output Quality: {value}%
outputQuality.description: Higher values = better quality but larger file size

megapixels.label: Megapixels
megapixels.description: Controls the resolution of the generated images

empty.title: No Images Generated Yet
empty.description: Fill out the form to start generating AI images. You can customize all parameters to match your vision.

copyPrompt.title: Prompt Copied
copyPrompt.description: Prompt has been copied to clipboard

empty.title: No Generation History
empty.description: Your generation history will appear here after you create some images.

gallery.title: Explore Community Creations
gallery.description: Discover incredible AI-generated artwork from our community and get inspired for your next creation.
gallery.pageDescription: Explore and get inspired by amazing AI-generated artwork from our community

prompts.1: Cyberpunk city at sunset with neon lights glowing
prompts.2: Magical forest with luminescent plants and winding stream
prompts.3: Futuristic space station orbiting a ringed gas giant
prompts.4: Surreal floating islands with waterfalls and ancient ruins
prompts.5: Steampunk airship battle in the clouds at dawn
prompts.6: Mystical underwater city with glowing architecture

liked.title: No Liked Images Yet
liked.description: Browse the gallery and like images that inspire you. Liked content will appear here.

saved.title: No Saved Images Yet
saved.description: Save images to collections for quick reference. Organize your inspirations here.

login.title: Login
login.description: Log in to access your profile, generation history, and saved images

pricing.title: Choose the Plan That's Right for You
pricing.subtitle: Whether you're a beginner or a professional creator, we have a plan that fits your needs

changePlan.question: How can I change my plan?
changePlan.answer: You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time in your account settings. Upgrades take effect immediately, while downgrades take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.

refund.question: Do you offer refunds?
refund.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the service, please contact our customer support team.

features.question: What advanced features are included in paid plans?
features.answer: Paid plans offer higher image generation limits, higher resolution output, advanced model access, watermark-free export, and priority customer support.

loginRequired.title: Please Log In
loginRequired.description: You need to be logged in to subscribe to a plan

freeUser.title: You're Already Using the Free Version
freeUser.description: You can upgrade to a paid plan anytime to get more features

subscriptionError.title: Subscription Failed
subscriptionError.description: An error occurred while processing your subscription request, please try again later

success.title: Payment Successful
success.description: Your payment has been successfully processed
success.message: Your account has been topped up, you can now use more features
success.redirecting: You will be automatically redirected to your profile page in:
